Responsibility Description: Develop administrative processes, provide administrative support and process data to allow for the efficient running of the business.
Responsibility Level Description: Conduct data entry into company systems, and review and verify the information to ensure accuracy and accessibility.

Responsibility Description: Create document management systems and maintain document records.
Prepare written documents for both internal and external audiences, in line with the organization's desired positioning and brand image.
Responsibility Level Description: Use standard office software to carry out basic formatting of letters, memoranda, and routine reports.

Responsibility Description: Plan and organize own work and that of the team to ensure the achievement of personal and team goals.
Responsibility Level Description: Organize own work schedule each day in line with changing priorities.

Responsibility Description: Execute and manage production or operations using predetermined protocols and procedures to achieve specified operational performance standards.
Responsibility Level Description: Carry out operational tasks by following established processes. May involve adjusting basic settings or parameters in order to meet performance standards.

Responsibility Description: Develop effective working relationships with clients within the organization, building high levels of professional credibility and mutual trust, and ensuring that internal clients have access to high-quality advice and guidance to support them in delivering their business strategy and plans.
Responsibility Level Description: Ensure a positive experience for internal clients by having courteous interactions with them.

Responsibility Description: Adhere to internal policies and procedures and external standards, including regulatory codes and voluntary codes of conduct, to minimize business risk and protect the organization's reputation.
Responsibility Level Description: Follow a range of mandatory procedures to ensure that work is carried out to the required quality standards and/or to ensure adherence to external regulatory codes and internal codes of conduct.

Responsibility Description: Collect and analyze data, produce reports, identify impact from reports, and make recommendations.
Responsibility Level Description: Perform basic data entry tasks, including data verification.

Responsibility Description: Develop personal skills, knowledge, technical competencies, and behavioral competencies to ensure that they are relevant to current and future role or organizational requirements, to enhance personal performance, to support innovation and new developments, and to fulfill personal potential.
Responsibility Level Description: Develop and maintain excellent procedural or technical skills by participating in assessment and development planning activities as well as formal and informal training and coaching.

Responsibility Description: Develop schemes of work and lesson plans and plan, prepare, assess, and reflect on lessons in line with the curriculum objectives.
Responsibility Level Description: Develop schemes of work and lesson plans and plan, prepare, assess, and reflect on lessons in line with the curriculum objectives primarily in secondary education.

Responsibility Description: Deliver lessons to (classes of) students. Engage students in learning to enable their understanding and application of knowledge, concepts and processes. Use proven teaching methods to get students involved in the active construction of knowledge using knowledge of subject matter  to transmit information and to transform students into active learners. From passive recipients of other people's knowledge into active constructors of their own and others' knowledge by creating the pedagogical, social, and ethical conditions under which students agree to take charge of their own learning, individually and collectively.
Responsibility Level Description: Deliver lessons to (classes of) students primarily in secondary education. Engage students in learning to enable their understanding and application of knowledge, concepts and processes. Use proven teaching methods to get students involved in the active construction of knowledge using knowledge of subject matter  to transmit information and to transform students into active learners.

Responsibility Description: Mark work, give appropriate feedback, observe, and record pupils' progress and development. Provide feedback to parents and carers on a pupil's progress at parents' evenings and other meetings.
Responsibility Level Description: Mark work, give appropriate feedback, observe, and record pupils' progress and development. Provide feedback to parents and carers on a pupil's progress at parents' evenings and other meetings. Primarily in higher secondary or tertiary education.

Responsibility Description: Develop and implement strategies for classroom management to realize a safe and effective learning environment.
Responsibility Level Description: Coordinate the implementation of diverse classroom management strategies, ensuring a safe and effective learning environment.

Responsibility Description: Develop evaluation tools and conduct program evaluations to determine the effectiveness of educational services.
Responsibility Level Description: Oversee the implementation of diverse evaluation measures for educational programs.

Responsibility Description: Plan and organize own work and that of the team to ensure the achievement of personal and team goals.
Responsibility Level Description: Assign short-term work schedules to a team of subordinates in order to achieve expectations while following established timelines.

Responsibility Description: Develop, design, and improve the curriculum, select content, assess the program and reflect.
Responsibility Level Description: Develop, design, and improve the curriculum, select content, assess the program and reflect primarily in higher secondary or tertiary education.

Responsibility Description: Adhere to internal policies and procedures and external standards, including regulatory codes and voluntary codes of conduct, to minimize business risk and protect the organization's reputation.
Responsibility Level Description: Identify, within the team, instances of noncompliance with the organization's policies and procedures and/or relevant regulatory codes and codes of conduct, reporting these instances and escalating issues as appropriate.

Responsibility Description: Develop personal skills, knowledge, technical competencies, and behavioral competencies to ensure that they are relevant to current and future role or organizational requirements, to enhance personal performance, to support innovation and new developments, and to fulfill personal potential.
Responsibility Level Description: Develop own capabilities by participating in assessment and development planning activities as well as formal and informal training and coaching; gain or maintain external professional accreditation, where relevant, to improve performance and fulfill personal potential. Maintain an understanding of relevant technology, external regulation, and industry best practices through ongoing education, attending conferences, and reading specialist media.
